query.name: findAllByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT sgm.*, sg.name as group_name,stmp.name as class_name FROM SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP sgm,STUDY_GROUP sg,study_template stmp, STUDY_SUBJECT ss WHERE sgm.study_group_id=sg.study_group_id AND sgm.study_subject_id=ss.study_subject_id AND ss.study_id=stmp.study_id AND sgm.study_template_id = stmp.study_template_id AND sgm.study_subject_id=? ORDER BY class_name asc

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP (study_template_id, study_subject_id, study_group_id, status_id, owner_id, date_created, notes, study_template_start_dt) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP SET study_template_ID=?, STUDY_SUBJECT_ID=?,STUDY_GROUP_ID=?, STATUS_ID=?,DATE_UPDATED=?, UPDATE_ID=?, NOTES=?, STUDY_TEMPLATE_START_DT=? WHERE SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP_ID=?

query.name: findAllByStudyTemplateAndGroup
query.sql: SELECT sgm.*, ss.label FROM subject_group_map sgm, study_subject ss WHERE sgm.study_template_id=? AND sgm.study_group_id=? AND sgm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id
